data.name: fullPriceListReport.ReportResourceString
data.value:
﻿<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <Report ScriptLanguage="Vb" ReportInfo.Created="05/19/2018 19:54:02" ReportInfo.Modified="05/21/2018 19:10:25" ReportInfo.CreatorVersion="2018.3.1.0"> <Dictionary> <OdbcDataConnection Name="Connection" ConnectionString="rijcmlqDsfwzqmpop0DqfGfr49Br1BEBRTg6bCmgJFsVfVGp0qFPEObhd3hT7IFAJw4XsqVYmk56fnGKrcLO+UpGfNk7yovZ1WDCE4n41hnLNhwI3xXLaBO6pcN0MYTJZhYTQHZ"> <TableDataSource Name="Table" Alias="Components" DataType="System.Int32" Enabled="true" SelectCommand="SELECT
 goodscatalog.GoodsName,
 goodscatalog.GoodsCost,
 goodsmanufacturer.GoodsManufacturerName,
 categorygoods.CategoryGoodsName
FROM goodscatalog
 INNER JOIN goodsmanufacturer
 ON goodscatalog.GoodsManufacturerID = goodsmanufacturer.GoodsManufacturerID
 INNER JOIN categorygoods
 ON goodscatalog.CategoryGoodsID = categorygoods.CategoryGoodsID"> <Column Name="GoodsName" DataType="System.String"/> <Column Name="GoodsCost" DataType="System.Decimal"/> <Column Name="GoodsManufacturerName" DataType="System.String"/> <Column Name="CategoryGoodsName" DataType="System.String"/> </TableDataSource> <TableDataSource Name="Table1" Alias="Software" DataType="System.Int32" Enabled="true" SelectCommand="SELECT
 softwaretype.SoftwareTypeName,
 software.SoftwareName,
 software.SoftwareCost
FROM software
 INNER JOIN softwaretype
 ON software.SoftwareTypeID = softwaretype.SoftwareTypeID"> <Column Name="SoftwareTypeName" DataType="System.String"/> <Column Name="SoftwareName" DataType="System.String"/> <Column Name="SoftwareCost" DataType="System.Decimal"/> </TableDataSource> <TableDataSource Name="Table2" Alias="AdditionalServices" DataType="System.Int32" Enabled="true" SelectCommand="SELECT
 additionalservices.AdditionalServiceName,
 additionalservices.AdditionalServiceCost
FROM additionalservices"> <Column Name="AdditionalServiceName" DataType="System.String"/> <Column Name="AdditionalServiceCost" DataType="System.Decimal"/> </TableDataSource> <TableDataSource Name="Table3" Alias="ServiceMaintenance" DataType="System.Int32" Enabled="true" SelectCommand="SELECT
 servicemaintenance.ServiceMaintenanceName,
 servicemaintenance.ServiceMaintenanceCost
FROM servicemaintenance"> <Column Name="ServiceMaintenanceName" DataType="System.String"/> <Column Name="ServiceMaintenanceCost" DataType="System.Decimal"/> </TableDataSource> </OdbcDataConnection> </Dictionary> <ReportPage Name="Page1"> <ReportTitleBand Name="ReportTitle1" Width="718.2" Height="47.25"> <TextObject Name="Text1" Left="264.6" Top="9.45" Width="170.1" Height="28.35" Text="Прайс-лист" HorzAlign="Center" VertAlign="Center" Font="Arial, 20pt, style=Bold"/> </ReportTitleBand> <PageHeaderBand Name="PageHeader1" Top="49.54" Width="718.2" Height="47.25"> <TextObject
